subject: Ryder Cup (Golf)
Golf
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: The P.G.A. of America announced changes to its points system in selecting the 2008 U.S. team Monday, and officially welcomed Paul Azinger as its next captain.
snippet: The P.G.A. of America announced changes to its points system in selecting the 2008 U.S. team Monday, and officially welcomed Paul Azinger as its next captain.
